review: I've had this for nine months now and it's never worked properly.  Occasionally I can get the stick to work alone without the extender cable, but only if the TV is configured so it can fit without the extender cable. The cable itself came out of the box broken, which I didn't figure out until it was too late to return the thing as this was a gift.  It doesn't work at all - and I've now tried it on other people's Fire Sticks so I know that to be true.And can I figure out how to contact anyone to get a new cable?  Nope.  Glad I didn't waste too much money on this thing.
